mapper.select: select o.order_date,o.table_code, p.product_name, p.product_price, od.order_amount, (p.product_price*od.order_amount) as order_price from orders o inner join orders_detail od on o.order_code = od.order_code inner join product p on od.product_code = p.product_code

select o.order_date,o.table_code, p.product_name, p.product_price, od.order_amount, (p.product_price*od.order_amount) as order_price from orders o inner join orders_detail od on o.order_code = od.order_code inner join product p on od.product_code = p.product_code where o.order_date between to_date(#{calendarBegin},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{calendarEnd} || '23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
